DOC.brief_title: Measuring Cyclotorsion Scanning Laser Ophthalmoscopy ( SLO ) -Fundus Photographs
DOC.criteria: ≥ 18 year old best correct visual acuity ≥ 0.8 strabismus except forth nerve palsy previous strabismus surgery monocle best correct visual acuity ≤ 0.6 hyperopia myopia > 6dpt
